title: Help-me, please!
body: I am Brazilian and I created an account on the NA server to create an account in PBE but I do not know the procedures. Help me please!

replies.body:
You can apply for PBE Access using [**this link**](https://pbesignup.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/pbe). If you'd like to find out more on the PBE System including how the system works and what type of players we look for when sending out invites, check out our [**PBE FAQ.**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751904-Public-Beta-Environment-FAQ#top)

If you have any other questions, let me know.
